alert.note: Alert for Huron; Sanilac; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 10:13PM EST until January 26 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM WEDNESDAY TO MIDNIGHT EST WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Huron, Sanilac and St. Clair Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM Wednesday to midnight EST Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on hazardous driving conditions, especially for the evening peak travel period. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall will become widespread mid to late morning and through the afternoon with periods of heavy snow expected. Snow will extend through the evening as some lake enhancement occurs. Northeast winds will also gust to 30 to 35 mph by Wednesday evening and overnight with blowing and drifting snow further impacting travel.
info.instruction: Plan for extra travel time, especially during the afternoon. Slow down and use extra caution while driving.
